Liz can't possibly see Danny through the hole but it looks like she is staring directly at him, her body rigid with fear. Danny grabs the wrench again.  Tries to get to his feet but slips back down, either too weak from loss of blood or just plain scared.  His hand is shaking violently. He looks through the hole again. THROUGH THE HOLE - Liz still staring at Danny. THE FOOTSTEPS CONTENCE at a agonizing slow pace, then stop. A GUN, ever so slowly, enters FRAME. EXTREME CLOSE UP on Liz's eyes as they widen. EXTREME CLOSE UP on Danny's eye peering through the hole. A SHOT IS FIRED. His eye closes. ON DANNY-his mouth opens to scream BUT NOTHING COMES OUT. And with that it is all over. Danny tries to get to his feet again. Fails, His eyes flutter. All is silent except for A FAINT LIQUID SPATTERING. LONG SHOT-Back on the Salton Sea, placid and silvered with moonlight. INT RESIDENTIAL HOTEL ROOM- NIGHT (LATER) Danny and Colette face-to face- in profile, silhouetted by the IMAGE of the sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She died knowing that I was a coward... that I didn't lift a finger to help her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There was nothing you could have done. She is inches closer to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you're wrong, I tried to tell myself the same thing but I could have gotten up. I could have done something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They would have killed you too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing could be worse then this slow death I'm living now. Colette puts her arms around him and hugs him tight. The IMAGE OF THE SEA FLICKERS AND FADES behind them. CLOSE ON DANNY-holding Colette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Colette...I want to help you, with Quincey. Colette pulls back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No Danny, Don't-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you gotta be serious about it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really, I don't want to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to do this for you.  I want to do something good for a change. Danny goes over to the dresser. Takes out a baggie of meth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want you to hide this somewhere where Quincy won't find it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never mind. Just do what I say. He holds out the baggie. Colette backs away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to. Danny stalks her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm offering you the chance to take care of your problems. Take it. (she still hesitates) Don't make the same mistake I did, Colette. Do something while you have a chance. Do it for your daughter before something happens. (beat) Believe me, you don't want to live with this burden. (firm) He helds the baggie out again. Colette reluctantly takes it from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tommorrow night, when he is asleep. I want you to beep me at this number. He writes the number down on a dollar bill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you do that? (off her nod) Then I want you to get out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry about it. Just go across the street and watch. You'll know when it's safe to go back. Colette goes to protest. Danny puts his hand to her mouth the same way she did to him earlier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just do it. All your problems with Quincey will be taken care of. INT. CINDER BLOCK BAR - DAY Empty except for Danny and Jimmy in a back booth. Danny slides an envelope over to Jimmy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tem thousand dollars. Everything I could spare. (beat) It's for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But why? You only owe me five. And that's not till after we close the deal tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You aren't coming with me. Jimmy looks hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you to do me a favor instead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait till I tell you what it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It don't matter. I'll do it. And you sure as hell don't have to pay me. Jimmy slides the money back over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're my best friend, man. I'd do anything for you. Danny smiles, genuinely touched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jimmy, look, there's something I have to tell you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, check it out... Jimmy rolls his sleeve up, revealing a tattoo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell is that? ON THE TATTOO: CRUDLEY DRAWN FACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's you! I didn't have a picture or nothin' so I had to describe you to the guy. Not bad though, huh? Jimmy sits there, admiring the tattoo. Danny stares at Jimmy with pity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really have to tell you something. It's important.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not a tweaker. (beat) I don't use drugs. I never had. Danny is deadpan.  Jimmy starts laughing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not joking. Jimmy keeps laughing. Danny staring, deadpan, Jimmy slowly stops laughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But...I've seen you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When? When did you ever see me use?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't like that Queen Elizabeth question, is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ever notice how I always showed up, in the middle of a binge? Left before it was over? How I sneak away for cap-naps? How when the crank came around to me, I always said I'd just done one? Jimmy slack-jawed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You asked me how I always keep my shit together. Well, that's how.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one ever noticed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you kidding me? A bunch of amped -out tweakers? It was easy. Jimmy is agitated and confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But... why? Why would you pretend?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't tell you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't trust me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't trust anybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you want me to do you some big favor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's cool. I understand Danny gets up to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait (beat) If you don't trust me, why did you tell me that stuff about not using drugs?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I don't want to see you end up like Kujo and those other losers. (beat) I thought that maybe if you knew that I didn't use, you might see it in yourself to go clear. EXT. BACK OF CINDERBLOCK BAR- DAY (LATER) Jimmy and Danny squinting in the mid-morning sun. They stand face-to- face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mad at me, Jimmy? Jimmy shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know... a little. I wish you would have let me in on it from the beginning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. I couldn't. Danny taps Jimmy's arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know you can get that tattoo removed, don't you. Jimmy rubs his arm where the tattoo is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah... I want to keep it. (beat) Maybe I can use it for like, inspiration ...you know...like when I detox?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good for you Jimmy. Danny takes the envelope from his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really want you to take this. Danny tries to hive Jimmy the envelope. Jimmy pushes it away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wouldn't be a favor if you were paying me. I'll just take my five when the deal is done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a good man. Jimmy the Finn. EXT. PARK-DAY Tanner and Garcetti's car parked on the periphery. INT. CAR-SAME Danny in the back seat dialing a CELL PHONE. A MICRORECEIVER ATTACHED TO THE PHONE. Tanner and Garcetti listening through earpieces. INT. UNKNOWN-SAME BUBBA answers a cell phone on the other end.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. CONVERSATION WILL INTERCUT BETWEEN TWO LOCATIONS DANNY Everything go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just make sure you come alone. This guy won't like any surprises
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I ain't a idiot, asshole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll see you tonight. Bubba hangs up. Danny turns the phone off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man of few words. Danny hands the phone back to Garcetti
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nervous?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With you clowns watching my back? What do you think? Danny opens the back door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just make sure you hit the floor when we come in. It could get ugly in there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I'd hate to shoot you by accident. Danny gets out of the car. Shuts the door. EXT. CAR-SAME Danny watches them drive away. When he is sure that they are gone, he looks around. Sees... ...A PLUMBER'S TRUCK parked on the other side of the park. INT. PLUMBER'S TRUCK-SAME AN HISPANIC GUY behind the wheel. HISPANIC GUY He's coming in. As Danny approaches the truck, the door slides open. He piles in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd it go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You tell me. Danny pulls a TINY MICROPHONE AND WIRE from inside his shirt and hands it to... ...Bubba, who sits in front of a BANK OF LISTENING EQUIPMENT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ready to go meet the team? EXT. FEDERAL BUILDING - WESTWOOD - DAY The PLUMBER'S TRUCK enters the underground parking lot. INT. F.B.I. OFFICES-DAY TEN F.B.I. AGENTS in a small conference room, looking at... ...Danny and Bubba, sitting at the head of the table. BUBBA is now wearing his security badge, which reads, SPECIAL AGENT TEX TRAHN. He stands up and addresses the group. And he really does have a SOUTHERN ACCENT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For those of you who don't know this is Tom Van Allen... a.k.a.  Danny Flynne. Danny looks self-conscious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: About a year and half ago, Mr. Van Allen's wife was murdered at a meth lab out near the Salton Sea. No one was ever apprehended for the crime but local authorities have always assumed it was a hit and grab perpetrated by rival drug dealers. That is, until Tom here took it upon himself to conduct a one-man undercover operation at great risk to his own personal safety. One of the agents pipes up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's a civilian? (off Trahn's nod) How the hell did you pull this off? Trahn turns to Danny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I played the long shot. Just got lucky. INT. SALTON SEA SHERIFF'S STATION (FLASHBACK) - DAY Danny and DETECTIVE BOOKMAN, a homicide detective, sitting at a table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about the car? The model? Danny shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was it a truck?  S.U.V.? Sedan?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All I saw was the headlights. The high beams were on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not even a guess?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many times do we have to go through this? ANOTHER DETECTIVE enters the room, hands something to bookman, then whispers into Bookman's ear. Bookman nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said one of the perpetrators crossed in front of the headlights ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but he was in silhouette.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about in the house?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were wearing ski masks. I told you all of this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you see his hair color?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Why? Bookman holds up a small plastic evidence baggie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forensics found this on your wife. Bookman holds it up to the light. Inside, ONE BRIGHT RED HAIR. ON DANNY staring at the hair, remembering something... EXT. SALTON SEA GAS STATION - DAY (FLASHBACK WITHIN THE FLASHBACK) Danny putting gas in his car, Liz in the passenger's seat reading. On the other side of the pump, A RED HAIRED MAN with a bad comb-over. The brightest, reddest hair you've ever seen with a BIG STREAK OF WHITE RUNNING THROUGH IT. His back is TURNED. We can't see his face. His arm and hands resting on top of the pump. Danny looks at the guy's hand. A GUADY CLASS RING on his finger: EL CAMINO COLLEGE, CLASS OF '84. INT. SALTON SEA SHERIFF'S STATION - DAY Danny staring absently at the red hair in the baggie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing, I'm trying to remember... Danny feigns frustration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry... I didn't see his hair color... I'm sure of it. INT. F.B.I. OFFICES-NIGHT AGENT ONE Why didn't you tell him? Danny looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I wanted to find them myself (beat) I wanted to kill them. INT. EL CAMINO COLLEGE LIBRARY-DAY Danny sitting at a table, poring over a YEARBOOK for the class of'84. VARIOUS SHOTS OF REDHEADS along with their majors. Danny continues thumbing through the book. Stops. A LOOK OF RECOGNITION ON HIS FACE. DETAIL OF A PHOTO: a balding red head with a streak of white running through it. Danny staring intently. REVEAL REST OF PHOTO: It is TANNER. Underneath the photo, his major: criminology. INT. EL CAMINO COLLEGE LIBRARY - DAY (LATER) Danny at a library computer. ON THE COMPUTER SCREEN. DANNY SCROLLING THROUGH an alumni listing, STOPPING ON... ...TANNER, GUS, CLASS OF 1984. DETECTIVE, GARDENA police Department. EXT. GARDENA POLICE DEPARTMENT-DAY Danny sitting on a bus bench across from the parking lot. TANNER AND GARCETTI exit the building and head over to their car. Danny watches from behind a magazine as they drive past him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear to God I would have done 'em right then and there...but I had to be positive.  And even if Tanner was involved, I had to be sure about Garcetti
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .M.V-DAY Danny talking to a MEXICAN DUDE on the corner. Danny slips the guy some money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So I became Danny Flynne. EXT. D.M.V.- DAY (LATER) The Mexican dude holds up something for Danny to see... ...A DRIVER'S LICENSE. It is him on the photo, but the name reads, DANIEL FLYNNE. EXT. STREET - NIGHT On Danny's last line, we see TWO CAR BUMPERS COLLIDING AT LOW SPEED. Tanner and Garcetti in the car that has been rear-ended. Danny in the offending car, empty beer cans scattered on the front seat. EXT. STREET-NIGHT (LATER) Danny spread-eagle over the hood with Garcetti roughly searching him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dropped myself right in their laps. Garcetti pulls a baggie of meth from Danny's pocket. EXT. DESERTED PARK-NIGHT Danny, Garcetti and Tanner at the picnic table, talking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gave up whoever they asked for, whenever they wanted. I was a fucking dream rat. But the whole time I was sizing them up, looking for any evidence that they were the guys who killed my wife. EXT. APARTMENT BUILDING-NIGHT Danny watching from the shadows as Tanner and Garcetti haul a DOPE DEALER away in cuffs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But they did everything by the book. F.B.I. OFFICES-DAY DANNY I knew that if these were the guys I was looking for, I'd have to set up a deal so sweet, they wouldn't be able to walk away from it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's when he called me. He told me his story and he pitched me a plan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These guys are smart. I knew they wouldn't hit a deal unless they knew all the players. I needed a big buyer. EXT. ROOFTOP-NIGHT Tanner and Garcetti watching Battle enter the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We had one of our C.I.'s call Tanner and Garcetti with an "anonymous" tip about the deal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This could be the one we're looking for. INT. POLICE STATION - DAY Garcetti scanning the print he took from the plastic wrapper. A COMPUTER SCREEN - the F.B.I. fingerprinting database. A MATCH IS MADE. BUBBA/ TRAHN'S PHOTO appears, along with the pertinent information. BATTLE (V.O.) ...I dumped a dummy file into the system. They took the bait and we were off to the races. INT. F.B.I. OFFICES-DAY Another agent kicks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How sure are you that you're not chasing two good cops? I mean all you've really got  is one red hair. That's still your only evidence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not anymore. We tapped these guys' phones and computers at Gardena P.D. Tanner and Garcetti didn't report on this deal. Not a peep. They haven't coordinated with Palmdale P.D. They're keeping it off the books. It looks like we've got the right guys. (beat) We'll find out for sure tonight. INT. F.B.I. OFFICES-DAY (LATER) The meeting breaking up. Trahn walks Danny away from the conference room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How you holding up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm fine. Little nervous...little disappointed that I didn't finish this myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you did the right thing. You wouldn't have stood a chance against these boys by yourself. They have eaten your ass alive. Danny's PAGER STARTS BEEPING. He checks the readouts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh shit
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you do me a favor? This girl I know, her boyfriend's a real piece of shit-dude's really jamming her up. I promised her I'd try to help. Danny pockets the pager.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you call Gardena P.D. tell 'em you got a tip that the guy's holding? Maybe have 'em send out a patrol car?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll see what I can do. INT. BANK-DAY Danny at the counter with a big gym bag. A TELLER COUNTS out stacks of money. THE LIFE INSURANCE CHECK lays on the counter in front of her. We see the amount -- $250,000.00 EXT. RESIDENTIAL HOTEL ROOM-NIGHT Colette standing across the street, looking at... ...TWO COPS exiting a patrol car. Colette is crying her eyes out. She is HOLDING the BAGGIE OF METH that Danny gave her. The cops enter the building just as... ... Danny drives by in Jimmy's car, followed by... ... TWO OF THE AGENTS from the conference room. They remain a good half-block behind him. INT. JIMMY'S CAR-NIGHT Danny at the wheel. He is wearing a black baseball cap pulled down low on his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey guys... INT. F.B.I. CAR-SAME Danny is wired for sound. The agents monitor him on a receiver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to stop for some cigarettes. EXT. MINI-MARKET-SAME Danny pulls into the market. The agents pull over to the curb, watching. Danny is in and out in no time. He hustles back into his car and drives away. EXT. REMOTE LOCATION-SAME Tanner and Garcetti outside of a car we have never seen before. The truck is open. Garcetti putting a phony license plate. Tanner sifting through the trunk. IN THE TRUNK - A sawed off SHOTGUN, TWO SEMI-AUTOMATIC HANGUNS, TWO KNIVES, GLOVES AND SKI -MASKS. INT. POOH-BEAR'S COMPOUND - NIGHT Pooh-Bear loading a chrome .45, Big Bill his Flintlock. INT. TRAHN'S CAR-SAME Trahn driving on the freeway. he opens a briefcase on the passenger's seat. Inside, his F.B.I. BADGE, TWO BARETTA 9mm and TWO PAIRS OF HANCUFFS. EXT. BLUFF-NIGHT Tanner and Garcetti negotiating a washboard dirt road in the hills. EXT. DESERT MOTEL - NIGHT The Vega pulls into the lot of a tumbleweed motel in the middle of nowhere. INT. F.B.I. CAR - SAME The car passes the motel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right people, heads up.  Blue team? EXT. DESERT MOTEL - SAME TWO MOTEL MAIDS pushing a cleaning cart.  They are wearing small ear piece receivers. Danny in the motel office, checking in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got a visual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red team? TWO WORKMEN, repairing the motel sign out front.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's heading to his room. The workman watch Danny head into a room at the far end of the facility.  As he enters the room ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Black team? INT. ADJACENT ROOM - SAME TWO AGENTS on the other side of the wall from Danny's room.  MONITORING WITH A FIBER-OPTIC CAMERA. ON THE MONITOR.  DANNY enters and sits on the bed, his back to the camera. INT. F.B.I. CAR - SAME They continue down the road, away from the motel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.  It's all yours. EXT. BLUFF - NIGHT Tanner pulls the car in behind a rock formation on the bluff. INT. CAR - SAME Tanner kills the engine.  Garcetti checks his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Half an hour to kickoff. Tanner takes a pair of NIGHT VISION BINOCULARS from under the seat. EXT. DESERT MOTEL - NIGHT Trahn pulls into the lot.  He emerges from the car with his briefcase, looks around, then heads down to the room. Trahn checks his watch, then KNOCKS ON THE DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's open. INT. DESERT MOTEL ROOM - NIGHT Trahn enters.  Danny sitting with his back to Trahn. ON THE BLACK AND WHITE SURVEILLANCE MONITOR NEXT DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You alone? Danny nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any word from Pooh-Bear? Danny shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay, hoss? BACK INSIDE THE ROOM Trahn walks over to Danny, who sits there with his head down, his face obscured by a baseball cap. Slowly, he looks up. IT IS JIMMY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Danny told me to tell you that he was sorry. (beat) He said he had to take care of this himself. EXT. BLUFF - NIGHT Tanner scanning with the night vision glasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here he comes. REVEAL that the car is on a bluff above POOH-BEAR'S COMPOUND. Danny pulls up in a rental car. INT. DANNY'S CAR - SAME Danny's hand is shaking uncontrollably.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easy, boy. He looks at his hand again. It continues to shake.  He takes a deep breath. TANNER'S P.O.V. As Danny gets out of the car and goes to the trunk. Tanner watching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Bubba?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe he isn't showing. Danny takes a gym bag out of the trunk and approaches Pooh-Bear's house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like Flynne's handling the cash. Let's get into position. They get out of the car and trek down the bluff towards the house. INT. POOH-BEAR'S HOUSE - NIGHT Big Bill lets Danny in, then pats him down for weapons.  Satisfied, he leads Danny to the kitchen. IN THE KITCHEN - Danny enters and stops.  A worried look. Pooh-Bear along with THREE OTHER MEN.  The men eye Danny silently. They look like ex-cons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell is this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just some buddies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is bullshit.  You didn't say anything about anybody else being here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck are you gonna do about it, dickhead? The other guys snicker, one of them almost spitting his beer out. Danny smiles good-naturedly.  Shoots a look over at ... ... one of the guys sitting where he taped his gun earlier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, man, let's deal. He throws the bag on the table, knocking a beer into the guys lap.  The guy springs up, pissed off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cool it. We got business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, dickhead. Danny moves over and plops down in the guys seat. UNDER THE TABLE - Danny fumbling with the gun, trying to untape it without being too obvious. Pooh-Bear unzips the bag. Inside, a lot of cash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my, oh my. (beat) Big Bill, come take a look at this. Big Bill is behind Danny, over by the sink.  He pulls his FLINTLOCK and walks over. Danny continues trying to get the gun loose.  Something catches his eye ... ... the MICROWAVE OVEN DOOR is open, casting a reflection of the room behind him.  Big Bill approaches Danny, pointing the gun at Danny's head. The other men ease back from the table a little. UNDER THE TABLE - Danny still can't get the gun loose. ON THE REFLECTION - Big Bill right behind Danny.  He raises the flintlock. Danny bugging.  He rips at the gun. Too late. Big Bill goes to fire.  Using the reflection, Danny ducks at the last instant. Big Bill FIRES. The guy across the table takes the mini-ball in the chest. ALL IN AN INSTANT - Danny extricates the gun.  Turns on Big Bill, who sees the gun and holds his hands up. Danny SHOOTS TWICE, the bullets blowing through Big Bill's hands and thumping into his chest.  Big Bill crumples. When Pooh-Bear goes to pull his gun from his waist-band, it discharges, shooting him in the thigh. The muzzle flash ignites his pants leg.  POOH-BEAR HITS THE FLOOR, SCREAMING, slapping at the fire on his leg. Danny wheels on the other two guys at the table, who are going for their guns.  Danny opens up on them with the Glock, flooring them before they can get a shot off. OUTSIDE - still descending the bluff, Tanner and Garcetti hear the gunfire. INSIDE - Danny turns on Pooh-Bear, who sits there staring at his injured leg. Danny puts the gun to Pooh-Bear's head, closes his eyes and starts to pull the trigger. Pooh-Bear lifts his gun and SHOOTS DANNY IN THE TORSO THREE TIMES. Danny collapses. Pooh-Bear gets to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh lordy, oh lordy, oh lordy.  Pooh- Bear done shot himself. He's in shock.  He grabs the duffle bag from the table and staggers down the hallway, into the living room. OUTSIDE - Tanner and Garcetti at the front door, listening. They pull their ski-masks on, take out their guns, then silently enter. INSIDE - gunsmoke abounds.  One of the guys MOANS on the floor. Tanner and Garcetti enter the kitchen, guns drawn and ready.  They survey the scene. Bodies everywhere. Big Bill lays there dying, staring with confusion at the stigmata in his hands. Danny lying in a heap, next to Big Bill. Suddenly, they hear POOH-BEAR MUMBLING from somewhere in the house. Tanner signals for Garcetti to take point.  They head down the long hallway, slowly and silently.  When they are gone ... ... Danny stirs on the floor. His eyes open.
